profile.name: Sean McArthur
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Palantir Technologies | Remote
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for Rust systems programming and database sharding. Proficient in Python and experienced in open source development.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Palantir Technologies as a potential employer for Sean Mc

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer, Palantir Technologies
description: Designed and implemented a high-performance database sharding system using Rust and PostgreSQL.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy large-scale data integration projects.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple open-source projects using Python, including a popular data visualization library.
Provided expert consulting services to clients on database design and optimization.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of the Rust compiler, focusing on performance optimization and code generation.
Mentored junior developers on best practices for Rust programming.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Python and Flask, including a popular e-commerce platform.
Provided expert consulting services to clients on software development best practices.
